text:
Trevorrow and Carmichael will executive produce, along with franchise patriarch Steven Spielberg. Frank Marshall and Pat Crowley are returning as producers.

Trevorrow was first tapped by Spielberg to direct the first installment in the rebooted franchise that hit theaters in 2015 and went on to gross $1.6 billion at the global box office.

The Jurassic World sequel, Fallen Kingdom, is set to bow June 22. Trevorrow, along with Spielberg, is exec producing the feature from director J.A. Bayona.

This is the first blockbuster Trevorrow has booked following his exit from Star Wars: Episode IX last year. (Directing duties have since been handed over to Force Awakens helmer J.J. Abrams). He is repped by Verve, 3 Arts and Ginsburg Libby.
title: Colin Trevorrow to Direct 'Jurassic World 3'

meta_data.description: Trevorrow helmed the rebooted franchise's first installment.
